name: @edge-llm/fine-tune
description: Python fine-tuning pipeline for FunctionGemma models (npm wrapper for frontend devs)

scripts.setup: python3 -m venv python/.venv && . python/.venv/bin/activate && pip install -r python/requirements.txt
scripts.setup:win: python -m venv python\.venv && python\.venv\Scripts\pip install -r python\requirements.txt

author: Ryuhei Yokokawa
